author: nurfikri89
body:
Backport of #47573

#### Original PR description:

This PR makes the following changes

1) Add UParT pT regression nodes in MiniAOD and NanoAOD.

2) Increase precision of `RawPFMET` and `RawPuppiMET` branches, since they are used for Type-1 MET re-correction.

3) Add `TriggerObj` Photon object `filterBit` for Photon45EB and Photon50EB.

#### PR validation:

- passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
- checked the branches exist and filled with sensible values, with a reMini+reNano of `RunIII2024Summer24` AOD.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backported for MiniAODv6 & NanoAODv15
title: [MiniAOD, NanoAOD] Backport of #47573 (AK8 subjets pT regression nodes, Photon TrigObj & MET fixes) to 15_0_X
